text: Raja Mishra (1947/1948 - 2 November 2020) was an Indian movie director, screenwriter, cinematographer and music director. He was a gold medalist in cinematography from Film and Television Institute of India, Pune. He directed a total of 12 Odia movies. His career began in 1978. He was born in Jatani, Khordha. Mishra was known for his works in Aranya Rodan, Nirbachana and Joymoti. Mishra died on 2 November 2020 from cardiac arrest in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, aged 72.Odia Film Director Raju Mishra Dies Of Cardiac Arrest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian cinematographers
title: Raju Mishra
